text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly lists and defines the Tag-Along right under section 1.B, stating: \"Ensures you can sell your shares on the same terms as founders if they sell their stake.\" This directly satisfies the requirement of defining the Tag-Along right as ensuring the investor can sell a pro rata portion of shares alongside the founders on the same terms.", "criterion_id": "32a99ce4-2e4a-42d1-bf72-6db07c939b16"}
